name: 25 Jumps
description:
Controls - left and right arrow keys to move, space to jump.

Hi,

This game is what happens when you start a game jam with 1 hour left. I really wanted to enter, since it is my first game jam, but good god. I over scheduled during the event which resulted in little time for the jam itself. While I'm not too happy with the game itself, I learned a lot about how to manage my time/have realistic expectations for a game jam.

-your boy (god this game sucks)
